{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Secretary / Sample Receptionist",
  "description": "Endpoint Laboratories and Equipment Limited (EPL) is a laboratory accredited by the relevant authorities, dedicated to providing reliable scientific analysis and environmental solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary / Sample Receptionist
Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Secretary / Sample Receptionist will manage front-desk operations, receive and document laboratory samples, and provide administrative support to ensure efficient daily operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive, label, and properly document incoming samples
	Attend to clients professionally and respond to inquiries
	Maintain accurate physical and electronic records of samples and office documents
	Prepare basic correspondence, reports, and internal documents
	Support general administrative and office duties


Qualifications


	A relevant university degree or equivalent qualification
	Practical experience in a secretarial, administrative, or reception role, preferably in a laboratory, medical, or professional office setting
	Experience handling client interactions, front-desk duties, and documentation
	Working knowledge of Microsoft Word and Excel for data entry, reporting, and record-keeping
	Ability to manage multiple tasks, maintain organised records, and meet deadlines
	Experience in sample reception, logging, or documentation will be an added advantage
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Good organisational and record-management abilities
	Basic computer proficiency
	Professional attitude and attention to detail.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;career@endpointlaboratories.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject line of the email.",

Secretary / Sample Receptionist Job at Endpoint Laboratories and Equipment Limited




        
    

        
        Endpoint Laboratories and Equipment Limited (EPL) is a laboratory accredited by the relevant authorities, dedicated to providing reliable scientific analysis and environmental solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary / Sample Receptionist
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Secretary / Sample Receptionist will manage front-desk operations, receive and document laboratory samples, and provide administrative support to ensure efficient daily operations.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Receive, label, and properly document incoming samples
	Attend to clients professionally and respond to inquiries
	Maintain accurate physical and electronic records of samples and office documents
	Prepare basic correspondence, reports, and internal documents
	Support general administrative and office duties


Qualifications


	A relevant university degree or equivalent qualification
	Practical experience in a secretarial, administrative, or reception role, preferably in a laboratory, medical, or professional office setting
	Experience handling client interactions, front-desk duties, and documentation
	Working knowledge of Microsoft Word and Excel for data entry, reporting, and record-keeping
	Ability to manage multiple tasks, maintain organised records, and meet deadlines
	Experience in sample reception, logging, or documentation will be an added advantage
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Good organisational and record-management abilities
	Basic computer proficiency
	Professional attitude and attention to detail.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: career@endpointlaboratories.com using the Job Position as the subject line of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Manager",
  "description": "Lead Enterprise Support Company Limited - Our client, a reputable Insurance Brokering Firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Department:&nbsp;Business Development / Marketing &amp; Sales
Grade Level: Senior Officer &ndash; Manager

Job Summary


	They are seeking a results-driven&nbsp;Business Development Manager with a strong track record in marketing insurance products and promoting insurance brokerage brands.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving business growth, expanding market presence, and leading business development initiatives.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective business development strategies.
	Coordinate and lead the business development team to achieve set targets.
	Generate new business opportunities and grow existing client portfolios.
	Expand the firm&rsquo;s market share and strengthen brand visibility.
	Gather market intelligence and provide data-driven insights for management decisions.
	Conduct competitor analysis to identify market trends and opportunities.
	Meet and exceed business development and revenue targets.


Job Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Insurance or a related discipline.
	Mandatory experience in insurance brokering and/or agency operations.
	Relevant professional insurance qualification is an added advantage.
	Proven track record of achievements in business development or a similar role.
	Excellent presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong analytical, problem-solving, and negotiation abilities.
	Good networking skills and in-depth knowledge of insurance products.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to:&nbsp;recruitment@leadhradvisory.com&nbsp;using &quot;Business Development Manager&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Business Development Manager Job at Lead Enterprise Support Company Limited




        
    

        
        Lead Enterprise Support Company Limited - Our client, a reputable Insurance Brokering Firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Business Development / Marketing & Sales
Grade Level: Senior Officer – Manager

Job Summary
     

            
    




	They are seeking a results-driven Business Development Manager with a strong track record in marketing insurance products and promoting insurance brokerage brands.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving business growth, expanding market presence, and leading business development initiatives.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective business development strategies.
	Coordinate and lead the business development team to achieve set targets.
	Generate new business opportunities and grow existing client portfolios.
	Expand the firm’s market share and strengthen brand visibility.
	Gather market intelligence and provide data-driven insights for management decisions.
	Conduct competitor analysis to identify market trends and opportunities.
	Meet and exceed business development and revenue targets.


Job Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Insurance or a related discipline.
	Mandatory experience in insurance brokering and/or agency operations.
	Relevant professional insurance qualification is an added advantage.
	Proven track record of achievements in business development or a similar role.
	Excellent presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong analytical, problem-solving, and negotiation abilities.
	Good networking skills and in-depth knowledge of insurance products.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: recruitment@leadhradvisory.com using "Business Development Manager" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Samsung Heavy Industries Nigeria
content:
Samsung Heavy Industries Nigeria (SHIN) is a key player in Nigeria's oil and gas and maritime industries, serving as the prime African subsidiary of the global shipbuilding giant, Samsung Heavy Industries (SHI) of Korea. Established in August 2011, SHIN has a fabrication and integration yard in Lagos.This facility is notable as Africa's first-ever and only Floating Production Storage and Offloading (FPSO) integration yard.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Senior Heavy Duty Mechanic

Job Location: Ladol, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Heavy Duty Mechanic to join our Maintenance team.
	In this critical role, you will be responsible for the maintenance and repair of a diverse fleet of heavy-duty equipment, ensuring operational efficiency and safety.


Responsibilities


	Perform comprehensive maintenance and repairs on heavy-duty equipment including Cranes, Forklifts, Cherry Pickers, Trucks, Self-Propelled Modular Transporter (SPMT), Reach Stacker, and Excavators.
	Diagnose and resolve complex issues related to Hydraulics, Pneumatics, Engines, and basic electrical systems.
	Supervise and mentor junior technicians, providing guidance and oversight on maintenance tasks.
	Undertake and successfully complete sensitive and critical repair jobs.
	Ensure all maintenance activities comply with safety regulations and company standards.


Requirements


	Trade test, OND, HND, or equivalent qualification. Additional certifications are a plus.
	Minimum of 10 years of experience in heavy-duty equipment maintenance and repair.
	Must be between 35 to 45 years old.
	Proven proficiency in troubleshooting and solving hydraulic, pneumatic, and engine problems.
	Strong safety awareness and commitment to compliance.


Application Closing Date: 18th February, 2026.

Click here to apply online

Aplication Instructions:


	Once you’ve applied, you’ll be invited to an AI-powered initial interview.
	To set yourself up for success, please take the interview on a PC or laptop in a quiet space with your webcam turned on.
	The interview consists of 8questions in total for a duration of 30minutes, to get the best out of this experience, try to go straight to the point in your responses.
	Security Notice: Please be advised that SHI-MCI will never ask for payment of any kind during or after the recruitment process. If you receive such a request, please disregard it.


 

 

2.) Structural Engineer

Job Location: Ladol, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a skilled Structural Engineer to join our team.
	In this role, you will be responsible for interpreting engineering drawings, performing structural analysis, and ensuring compliance with safety standards within the fabrication industry.
	Your expertise will be crucial in supporting our production and fabrication teams.


Responsibilities


	Interpret engineering drawings and blueprints.
	Perform structural weight calculations and material take-off (MTO).
	Conduct structural analysis and simulation using CAD/CAE software.
	Support production and fabrication teams with technical drawings.
	Verify structural integrity and compliance with safety standards.
	Prepare reports, design reviews, and technical documentation.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree or Higher National Diploma in Civil or Structural Engineering.
	Must have a minimum of 5 years in structural design in the fabrication industry.
	Ability to accurately interpret engineering drawings and blueprints.
	Proficiency in conducting structural analysis and simulations using relevant CAD/CAE software.
	Experience in preparing technical documentation, including reports and design reviews.
	Understanding and ability to verify structural integrity against safety standards.


Application Closing Date: 5th March, 2026.

Click here to apply online

Note


	Once you’ve sent in your application, you’ll be invited to an AI-powered initial interview.
	To set yourself up for success, please take the interview on a PC or laptop in a quiet space with your webcam turned on."
	The interview consists of 6 questions in total for a duration of 30minutes, to get the best out of this experience, try to go straight to the point in your responses.
	Security Notice: Please be advised that SHI-MCI will never ask for payment of any kind during or after the recruitment process. If you receive such a request, please disregard it.


 

3.) Technical Proposal Manager (Offshore Marine Engineering / Logistics Industry Experience)

Job Location: Ladol, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Main Function Within Department


	Leading the development of high-quality technical proposals and supporting the General manager (Commercial & Proposals) in preparing comprehensive commercial submissions. This role ensures that all proposals are aligned with client requirements, industry standards, and the company's technical and operational capabilities - contributing directly to successful contract acquisition and strategic positioning.
	In addition to proposal development, the Technical Proposal Manager collaborates closely with the project manager and construction team during the bidding stage to integrate accurate technical inputs, execution, strategies and resource planning.
	During project execution, the role extends to monitoring technical performance to ensure alignment with contractual scope and specifications. Upon project completion, the Technical Proposal Manager is responsible for capturing lessons learned to ensure future proposal strategies and execution planning.


Job Description


	Invitation to tender (ITT) review and technical clarification with the clients.
	Define the materials required for the project and prepare Request for Quotations (RFQs)
	Define the activities required for subcontracting and prepare Request for Quotations (RFQs)
	Preparation (or validation) of MTO
	Technical bid evaluation
	Prepare technical proposal (i.e. project execution plan, schedule and etc)
	Coordinate with project, construction and engineering teams during bidding.
	Support General manager (Commercial & Proposal) in bid strategy and pricing.
	Monitor technical execution to ensure alignment with scope and contract.
	Capture lesson learned after project completion for future improvement.


Required Qualification


	Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's degree is an advantage)
	7+ years in proposals or project engineering in offshore/marine/logistics sector.
	Strong technical understanding of fabrication and ship repair
	Good knowledge of industry standards
	Proficiency in MS office and proposal tool (AutoCAD is a must)
	Strong communication and coordination skills.


Application Closing Date: 31st January, 2026.

Click here to apply online

Note


	Review the job description and apply using the Link above. Once you’ve applied, you’ll be invited to an AI-powered initial interview. To set yourself up for success, please take the interview on a PC or laptop in a quiet space with your webcam turned on.
	The interview consists of 8 questions in total for a duration of 30 minutes, to get the best out of this experience, please keep your answers focused and to the point.
	Important Security Notice: Please be advised that SHI-MCI will never ask for payment of any kind during or after the recruitment process. If you receive such a request, please disregard it.


 

 

4.) Maintenance Officer / Admin

Job Location: Lagos

Job Description


	Documentation: Updating maintenance documents such as staff attendance (annual or sick leave) on proprietary application, gas usage records, inventory and materials usage log, etc. for the Utility and maintenance unit. Collating material consumables list and draft complete approval requests for maintenance material purchases.
	Health and safety: Coordinating site staff PPE issuance and colle3ction wehn needed. Develop job safety analysis for simple tasks.
	Follow up with site staff regarding PPE disbursed to ensure that damaged PPEs are replaced timely.
	Relating with vendors and other departments within the organisation through face-to face interactions and official emails.


Required Qualifications


	Candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree in Electrical Engineering or it equivalent. Additional relevant certifications will be a plus with 3-5 years of working experience
	Proficient use of Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Powerpoint, Excel)


Skills & Knowledge:


	Competent in data entry with minimal errors, record and file management, good verbal and written communication.


Application Closing Date: 22nd February, 2026.

Click here to apply online

     

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Thirstify.ng
content:
Thirstify.ng is a leading sales and distribution outlet for Alcoholic and non-alcholic beverages.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Graphics Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Ability to do video editing, motion graphics and use various softwares for design.
	Social media content experience.


Requirements
     

            
    




	Interested candidates should possess an OND with at least 3 years of experience.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / month

Application Closing Date: 15th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: j.johnson@thirstify.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) HR Assistant

Job Location: Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Nysc

Job Description


	Staff File Management
	Relate with relevant GOVT agencies.
	Represent the company in key stakeholders meetings.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a First degree with 0 - 1 year of experience.


Salary
N50,000 - N70,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 31st January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: t.babalola@thirstify.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For enquiries, call 09137862922.

 

 

3.) Shop Attendant

Job Location: Magodo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties


	Attending to customers
	Shelving of products in the Supermarket.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an FSLC qualification with 1 year of work experience.


Salary
N60,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 15th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Bestbargainshub@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Candidates residing around Isheri - Olowrora, Magodo, Ojodu-Berger, Ikeja are preferable.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Software Engineer - Data Infrastructure",
  "description": "Canonical - We deliver open source to the world faster, more securely, and more cost-effectively than any other company. We develop Ubuntu, the world&rsquo;s most popular enterprise Linux from cloud to edge, together with a passionate global community of 200,000 contributors. Ubuntu means &#39;humanity to others. We chose it because it embodies the generosity at the heart of open source, the new normal for platforms and innovation. Together with a community of 200,000, we publish an operating system that runs from the tiny connected devices up to the world&#39;s biggest mainframes, the platform that everybody uses on the public cloud, and the workstation experience of the world&#39;s most productive developers. Secure and reliable, elegant and intuitive, and open for innovation - Ubuntu is the future of open source, which is why it&#39;s the fastest-growing Linux in the world despite already being the most widely deployed.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Software Engineer - Data Infrastructure

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Full-time

What your day will look like


	The data platform team is responsible for the automation of data platform operations.
	This includes ensuring fault-tolerant replication, TLS, installation, and much more; but also provides domain-specific expertise on the actual data system to other teams within Canonical.&nbsp; This role is focused on the creation and automation of features of data platforms, not analysing the data in them.
	Collaborate proactively with a distributed team
	Write high-quality, idiomatic Python code to create new features
	Debug issues and interact with upstream communities publicly
	Work with helpful and talented engineers including experts in many fields
	Discuss ideas and collaborate on finding good solutions
	Work from home with global travel for 2 to 4 weeks per year for internal and external events.


What we are looking for in you


	Have a Bachelor&rsquo;s or equivalent in Computer Science, STEM, or a similar.
	Proven hands-on experience in software development using Python
	Proven hands-on experience in distributed systems.

Software Engineer - Data Infrastructure job at Canonical Nigeria




        
    

        
        
     

            
    

Canonical - We deliver open source to the world faster, more securely, and more cost-effectively than any other company. We develop Ubuntu, the world’s most popular enterprise Linux from cloud to edge, together with a passionate global community of 200,000 contributors. Ubuntu means 'humanity to others. We chose it because it embodies the generosity at the heart of open source, the new normal for platforms and innovation. Together with a community of 200,000, we publish an operating system that runs from the tiny connected devices up to the world's biggest mainframes, the platform that everybody uses on the public cloud, and the workstation experience of the world's most productive developers. Secure and reliable, elegant and intuitive, and open for innovation - Ubuntu is the future of open source, which is why it's the fastest-growing Linux in the world despite already being the most widely deployed.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Software Engineer - Data Infrastructure

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

What your day will look like


	The data platform team is responsible for the automation of data platform operations.
	This includes ensuring fault-tolerant replication, TLS, installation, and much more; but also provides domain-specific expertise on the actual data system to other teams within Canonical.  This role is focused on the creation and automation of features of data platforms, not analysing the data in them.
	Collaborate proactively with a distributed team
	Write high-quality, idiomatic Python code to create new features
	Debug issues and interact with upstream communities publicly
	Work with helpful and talented engineers including experts in many fields
	Discuss ideas and collaborate on finding good solutions
	Work from home with global travel for 2 to 4 weeks per year for internal and external events.


What we are looking for in you


	Have a Bachelor’s or equivalent in Computer Science, STEM, or a similar.
	Proven hands-on experience in software development using Python
	Proven hands-on experience in distributed    

    

        Click here to Apply
